meta.description: Determine the optimal number of regular and premium car models to produce daily to maximize profit, given production and demand constraints.

sets.name: MODELS
sets.description: Types of car models produced by the manufacturer.

params.name: demand_limit
params.description: Maximum daily demand for each car model.

params.name: total_production_limit
params.description: Maximum total number of cars that can be produced daily.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of cars produced daily for each model.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selling regular and premium car models.

constraints.name: demand_constraint_regular
constraints.description: Production of regular models cannot exceed daily demand.

constraints.name: demand_constraint_premium
constraints.description: Production of premium models cannot exceed daily demand.

constraints.name: total_production_constraint
constraints.description: Total production of cars cannot exceed the daily production limit.
